analysis.description:
MiniMeToken.balances (/unique_chucks/14/0x06cda3b81bcc049c6e379ab394adb851d2844c31.sol#135) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- doTransfer (/unique_chucks/14/0x06cda3b81bcc049c6e379ab394adb851d2844c31.sol#232-271)
	- balanceOfAt (/unique_chucks/14/0x06cda3b81bcc049c6e379ab394adb851d2844c31.sol#350-373)
	- generateTokens (/unique_chucks/14/0x06cda3b81bcc049c6e379ab394adb851d2844c31.sol#443-458)
	- destroyTokens (/unique_chucks/14/0x06cda3b81bcc049c6e379ab394adb851d2844c31.sol#461-481)
MiniMeToken.isContract (/unique_chucks/14/0x06cda3b81bcc049c6e379ab394adb851d2844c31.sol#543-547) is declared view but contains assembly code

Reentrancy in MiniMeToken.approve (/unique_chucks/14/0x06cda3b81bcc049c6e379ab394adb851d2844c31.sol#283-301):
	External calls:
	- ! TokenController(controller).onApprove(msg.sender,_spender,_amount) (/unique_chucks/14/0x06cda3b81bcc049c6e379ab394adb851d2844c31.sol#298-300)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allowed (/unique_chucks/14/0x06cda3b81bcc049c6e379ab394adb851d2844c31.sol#300)

MiniMeToken.getValueAt.min (local variable @ /unique_chucks/14/0x06cda3b81bcc049c6e379ab394adb851d2844c31.sol#511) shadows:
	- MiniMeToken.min (function @ /unique_chucks/14/0x06cda3b81bcc049c6e379ab394adb851d2844c31.sol#550-558)

MiniMeToken.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/14/0x06cda3b81bcc049c6e379ab394adb851d2844c31.sol#543-547)
	- /unique_chucks/14/0x06cda3b81bcc049c6e379ab394adb851d2844c31.sol#546-547
MiniMeToken.version should be constant (/unique_chucks/14/0x06cda3b81bcc049c6e379ab394adb851d2844c31.sol#106)

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/14/0x06cda3b81bcc049c6e379ab394adb851d2844c31.sol#13-14:
